item.name: Lei of Navia
entries: This lei of mostly small white blooms features three large and brightly colored flowers. When you eat a large flower, you get +2 to saving throws verses illusions and enchantments for 8 hours.

item.name: Ring of Protection
entries: You gain a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws while wearing this ring.
